column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////I cannot possibly say enough wonderful things about Bavette's. My girlfriend and I decided to celebrate our one year anniversary here during a recent trip to Chicago
column2: and we could not have made a better choice. Walking through the doors feels like stepping back in time into a 1920's lively jazz bar - dim lighting
column4: and beautiful decor. We were seated in the downstairs space
column5: which takes on an even more intimate and speakeasy feel. The host team greeted us immediately and warmly
column7: and ensured we were sat promptly. Once we were at our FANTASTIC table
column8: our waiter also immediately greeted us
column10: and served us a complimentary champagne toast for the occasion.
